Description:

2026 comes , and the world is ruled from behind the scenes power-hungry corporation " Nogaro " , the developer of a new powerful source of energy called " Ambrosia " . Unknown population globe Ambrosia - fruit research mysterious meteorite fragment , which owns " Nogaro " . To save it , it will go on anything. Challenge corporation " Nogaro " dares only one organization - Initiative " Tarn " , an anonymous group of saboteurs - opponents corporations intending to reveal the truth about Ambrosia and break the iron grip , which " Nogaro " keeps the world . In the game "Scourge: Outbreak" you lead a detachment of "Echo" - an elite group of mercenaries whose initiative " Tarn " requested inflict a decisive blow corporation " Nogaro " . Other orders initiatives " Tarn " entrusted with distracting attack, and the detachment "Echo" is worth the most important task : first, to find and rescue Dr. Reysbeka , double agent " Tarn " Corporation " Nogaro " ; second, to grab a piece of the meteorite that is stored in the depths of laboratories " Nogaro " . Powerful arsenal of weapons and special abilities to help crush all obstacles on your way to finding the truth about the terrible fuel technology " Ambrosia " corporation " Nogaro " . Campaign mode of interaction with support for up to 4 players and with full support for connecting and disconnecting the players during the game . Through memories that only sees your character and find out how they are consistent with what they see your friends ! The whole experience and all gaming skills obtained in Campania, you remain in the multiplayer modes for 8 players . Gameplay Scourge: Outbreak mode mortal combat, mortal combat command and capture the flag is very fleeting , and will stand in good stead fast reflexes , sensitive fingers and constant motion ! You wait 5 shrouded death maps for multiplayer games in which you will be able to continue the slaughter group " Echo" with security " Nogaro " for supremacy on the island Nogaro !

Features: 

- 4 full level, the passage of which take more than 7 hours 
- Campaign mode of interaction for 4 players 
- 9 powerful weapons 
- Scene memories that are unique for each character 
- System received for 20 experience ranks and abilities 
- Supports up to 8 players on the 5 maps in mode "Confrontation" - death battle, team battle and capture the flag! .
